message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. This is a high-quality item that I believe will meet your needs perfectly. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or concerns.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality you're offering, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm happy to pay $100 for the product. Let me know if you're open to that.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider a compromise at $110 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
